item.title: Exam season offers – Exciting promotions: Up to 350,000 VND off for all Windows Laptops and Monitors products
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description: When purchasing directly at Hoang Ha Mobile branches, customers will receive additional discounts...
item.content:encoded:
Applicable subjects

Applies to pupils, students and teachers

Each phone number or ID card/citizen identification card can only participate in purchasing a maximum of 02 products.

 

Instructions for receiving incentives

Customers bring valid documents to Hoang Ha Mobile’s systems or send them via Zalo, Facebook, Gmail… to the shops. Required documents include:

– ID card/CCCD

– For students: Customers bring one of the following documents: Student card, Admission notice, Tuition payment form, transcript… Documents related to the national high school exam such as: Card exam, high school diploma, score report, admission notice, admission notice…

– For teachers:: Teacher card, lecturer card, certificate of being a teacher or lecturer

Note: Students who do not have ID card can use a document such as student card, transcript, student certificate… (no need for citizen identification)
